# removeRows(at:includeSubrows:)

**Instance Method**

Removes the rows at given indexes.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor func removeRows(at rowIndexes: IndexSet, includeSubrows: Bool)
```

## Parameters

- **rowIndexes**: Indexes of one or more rows in the receiver.


- **includeSubrows**: If [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true], then sub-rows of deleted rows are also deleted; if [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/false], then each sub-row is adopted by its first non-deleted ancestor, or becomes a root row.

## Manipulating Rows

- **addRow(_:)**: Adds a row to the receiver.
- **insertRow(at:with:asSubrowOfRow:animate:)**: Adds a new row of a given type at a given location.
- **removeRow(at:)**: Removes the row at a given index.
